channel.title: I need help with many things
channel.description: 1. H0w d0 i change wen u start the server and when y0u spawn wen u die? 2. H0w d0 i change the rate 0f xp y0u get fr0m m0nsters? 3. H0w d0 i change price 0f items in sh0ps? 4. H0w d0 i add items t0 a sh0p? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Talking like a complete retard.[/center]

item.title: I need help with many things
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

  1. H0w d0 i change wen u start the server and when y0u spawn wen u die?
    Look for all applyDeads, and change the coordinates in them to where you want people to respawn. Look in player.java for teleport coords, and change them for server starting place.

  2. H0w d0 i change price 0f items in sh0ps?
    Go into Item.cfg, and change the 3 numbers after the name of the item.

  3. H0w d0 i add items t0 a sh0p?
    Go into Shop.cfg, and find the shop name of the shop you want to add items to. Youâ€™ll see a long line of numbers, going Item ID, amount, Item Id, amount, Item Id, amount. Add onto there.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with many things

item.title: I need help with many things
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

  1. player.java coords
  2. inCombat(); if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 1; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType); } change the numbers with * hitdiff
  3. item.cfg first 3 numbers
  4. shops.cfg ID then amount
